p: The source of the alginate affects the ratio of M and G residues, which have an impact on the physical and chemical properties of the alginate, as well as the viscosity of the coating solution and thickness on the product [ 28, 36, 39]. Martinsen, et al. [ 40] characterized the relationship of physical properties of alginate gel beads with a polymer composition, sequential structure, and molecular size of the several different alginate sources.
